makara lagnaye udawa sama`ga upatha himi wu mbaaba wethata guru paminenne dharmasthanaya mathatayi.pawathi thathwayata wada yahapath bawak yedena paladayaka ga්raha maruwaki.usas adhyapanaye niyathu mbaabata paladayak bawak yede.pujya pakshaye menma usas ayage adhara himi wana dharmaya wetha yomu wana kalayaki.katayuthu sa`daha yeduna yami badhawan iwath wanu atha.widesha gaman ,durapalathwala gaman ,wandana gaman ,adhyapanika gaman yedenu atha.nawa adhayapanika katayuthu arabimatath wibhaga sa`daha idiripath wimatath bhawana aada katayuthu wala yedimatath kalaya yahapath.saukhya thathwayeda yahapath bawak balaporoththu wiya hakiyi.pitapalath sama`ga kerena ganudenu aadiyen pa්rathipala yedenu atha.

ra 12ta itharath mel fayar wunama gedara wada okkoma paththaka thiyala ofis eke wada karapan kiyana ekane.meka ape mati mola walata therenne nathi hati.lapak dila wi pi en denawa oone welawaka ofis ekata kanekt wenna kiyala.lapakuth dila gedara indalama wada karanna puluwan kiyana eka ape kattiyatayi gewal wala ayatayi ithin niyama godayata majikma thama.eeta passe ithin senasuradayi iridayith gedarata wela ofis wada karapanko.nodakin api wage harak.ofis fon dilath kompani karanne me keliyama thama.wahal kan walata ahu welath apita eewa hari loku wada.ko ethakota le halala dina gaththa paya ate wada muraya?ko apita oo ti?hari ee mukuth oone na.ko ape pawul saha yahapath jana samajaya.gani minihage fes buk yaluwo chek karanawa.masej awut boks chek karanawa.mel owut boks chek karanawa.minihath ee tikama karanawa.thama thamange duwa putha, pemwatha, pemwathiya ganath ehemama thama(godak aya).mewa nikan api atharata nathi prashna aran awilla.godak minissu bokke biththara thamba thamba thama jiwath wenne.me okkoma prashna wahagena apith mewa karanawa kiyala pennanna oone kiyana boru ujaruwak mehe kattiyata thiyana eka thama hene.naththan me godak dewal me wenakota api atha arinna oone.windinna thiyana jiwithe nikan windonawa.
